oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elks National Convention and Worlds Fair
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Elks National Convention and Worlds Fair New York City 1939 -- The Booker T. Washington High School Drum and Bugle Corps, Composed of Junior Elks of Memphis, Tennessee -- Left: J.E. Kelly Grand Secy, B.T. Hung Regional Director of Education, Right: G.W. Lee Exalted Ruler of Bluff City Lodge No. 96, Rev. H.P. Gibson, Chairman Civil Liberties, Miss Lucy L. McClinton, Sponsor." Two-tone photo.
Handwritten: "Mr. E.H. Crump -- 1962 Peabody Ave. -- Memphis Tenn." -- "Girls of B.T.W. Hi Drum & Bugle wish me to tell you they are on their way. A million thanks to you. by Blair T. Hunt."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Booker T. Washington High School; schools; music; Elks; Lee, George W.; Hunt, Blair T.; Kelly, J. E.; Gibson, H. P.; McClinton, Lucy; Crump, E. H.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hunt, Blair T.
